price.title: Cheap, transparent prices!

price.contact_2: You can test the subscriptions and won't be charged.
price.faq_detail: Explore our comprehensive FAQ to find quick answers to common inquiries. If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us for personalized help.

marketing.title: Turn Vibes into Videos – Instantly.
marketing.sub_title: AI filmmaking for creators, businesses, musicians, and teams.
marketing.sub_features: Cloud-native: Simplifying technology and reducing costs for startups.
marketing.final_cta: Ready to create your next video sensation? Join SuperDuperAI.

right_side.deploy_on_vercel_desc: Get started in seconds, turn your vibe into stunning visuals instantly.
right_side.ship_on_cloudflare_desc: Create professional videos with AI. No budget, no crew needed.
right_side.showcase_desc: You direct, AI executes. Multiple specialized agents working together to create your vision.

features_grid.monorepo_desc: Create and save your personalized AI actors with memory (LoRA) for consistent performance across videos.
features_grid.i18n_desc: Professional camera movements - pans, zooms, bullet-time - all without physical equipment.
features_grid.payments_desc: Specialized AI agents working together: screenplay, visuals, characters, editing, all coordinated.
features_grid.nextauth_desc: From idea to finished video in minutes, at a fraction of traditional production costs.

people_comment.title: What People Are Saying
people_comment.desc: Hear from creators who've transformed their visions into reality with SuperDuperAI.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Direct your video in 3 easy steps – AI agents handle the rest.
how_it_works.step1_desc: Describe your idea, vibe, and story - the AI understands your creative intent.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Multiple agents create the script, visuals, characters, and animations together.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Adjust styles, edit text, and export your finished video to any platform.

use_cases.title: Made for Creators, Businesses, Musicians & Teams
use_cases.creators_desc: Create more content, grow your audience, increase revenue.
use_cases.business_desc: Professional video ads without agencies or big budgets.
use_cases.musicians_desc: Music videos and visuals that match your track's vibe.
